articles.description: The social video sharing app once seemed just for teenagers but since social isolation started, more and more people are joining TikTok for connection, comedy and creativity.
articles.content:
Posted 
April 25, 2020 09:19:12
"If it wasn't for coronavirus, I wouldn't have downloaded it and the fact that I have makes me feel a little bit embarrassed," says Hannah Baker, a new TikTok devotee.
The 27-year-old judge's associate says one thing that go… [+7054 chars]

articles.title: Seinfeld and Star Trek actor Gene Dynarski dies at 86 - 9Celebrity
articles.content:
Gene Dynarski, the actor who played Izzy Mandelbaum Jr the son of Lloyd Bridges on the hit sitcom Seinfeld has died. He was 86.
Dynarski, who also starred in Steven Spielberg's Duel and Close Encounters of the Third Kind, died on February 27 at a rehabilitat… [+1504 chars]

articles.title: Arnhem Land is in lockdown – but you can visit through online concerts - The Guardian
articles.description: Aboriginal artists are streaming free music and dance performances during the coronavirus crisis
articles.content:
Aboriginal remote communities have been closed to the outside world for weeks amid the coronavirus crisis, designated as biosecurity areas and locked down for their own safety with non-essential visitors banned.

articles.title: Captain Tom Moore becomes oldest person to top Britain's music chart - The Age
articles.description: A World War II veteran who raised millions for charity has now become the oldest person to top Britain's main music chart.
articles.content:
He also went to No.1 on the music charts - with a little help from a friend.
